name: Reef Shark
description: A medium-sized predator with sharp teeth, known for swift swimming in warm, shallow waters near coral reefs.
memorable: Efficient hunter that attacks when provoked, especially in packs.
goals: Hunt fish and smaller sea creatures for food.
relations: Often found hunting in small packs with other reef sharks.
environment: Warm, shallow waters near coral reefs.
strengths: Good melee damage output with Bite and advantage on attacks through Pack Tactics.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma hinder complex actions and social interactions.
attacks: Bite attack with 6 piercing damage, enhanced by Pack Tactics when hunting in groups.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, providing advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
senses: Blindsight with a range of 30 feet allows perception of surroundings without sight.
skills: Possesses perception proficiency, enhancing its ability to detect threats in its environment.
additional_information: Can only breathe underwater, limiting its mobility on land.
Typically measures 6 to 10 feet in length.
Swift and agile predator, making it formidable in water.
test_queries: medium shark predator in shallow waters
swift aquatic predator with sharp teeth
shark that hunts in packs near coral reefs
shark known for water breathing and stealth attacks
